messages.title: 3 great reasons to vote for Simon
messages.content: He will fight to safeguard funding for our local NHS. Only the Lib Dems will increase the NHS budget by the £8bn needed. Simon is serious about prioritising mental health funding. The Lib Dems have pledged to help people get the right support. His key commitment is protecting education spending ensuring every child has the best chance from nursery to college.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Increase the NHS budget by the £8bn needed.
Prioritising mental health funding to help people get the right support.
Protecting education spending to ensure every child has the best chance from nursery to college.

images.caption: Simon Waddington - Lib Dem candidate for Erith & Thamesmead
